alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 09 at 3:30AM MST until December 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, total snowfall of 3 to 6 inches in the valleys and 5 to 10 inches in the mountains. For the Winter Storm Watch, additional accumulation of 6 to 12 inches are possible, except 8 to 18 inches over the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. Including Interstate 84, Highway 55, and Highway 21 corridors. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
